overview_of_class: Consciousness is arguably the most mysterious and the most important phenomenon for most of us. What is our inner experience? Is it real? Can science make inroads into providing any substantive understanding of consciousness? We will tackle consciousness from mystical, philosophical, computational, and neuroscientific perspectives. Although we will not solve consciousness this summer, students will learn a variety of ways in which scientists have conceptualized, experimented, and theorized about consciousness.
name: Consciousness
subject: PSYCH
